title: Saguaro National Park: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather        Lightning strike in Tucson. View from Rincon Mountain District parking lot, looking west. NPS Photo/Laura Bolyard   Â   Summers can be extremely hot with daytime temperatures exceeding 105 degrees F (41 degrees C) in the shade, and evening lows averaging 72 degrees F (22 degrees C). Winters in the Tucson area are delightful with mild warm days averaging 65 degrees F (19 degrees C) and cool nights averaging 40 degrees F (5 degrees C). Always wear a hat and use sunscreen while hiking. Drink plenty of water, we recommend at least one gallon of water per person, per day.Western Region NOAA Weather Forecast
